Container.Name: Huntarr-Sonarr
Container.Overview: DEPRECATED: Use Huntarr instead. [br] Huntarr (Sonarr Edition) continually searches your Sonarr library for shows with missing episodes and episodes that need quality upgrades. It automatically triggers searches for both missing episodes and episodes below your quality cutoff. It's designed to run continuously while being gentle on your indexers, helping you gradually complete your TV show collection with the best available quality.

Container.Requires: Requires a separate Sonarr v5 instance.

Config.Name: Enable Web UI
Config.Description: Enable the web UI for Huntarr

Config.Name: Sonarr - API Key
Config.Description: API key for your Sonarr instance

Config.Name: Sonarr - Monitored Only
Config.Description: Only process monitored shows and episodes

Config.Name: Sonarr - Skip Future Episodes
Config.Description: Skip processing episodes with release dates in the future

Config.Name: Sonarr - Skip Metadata Refresh
Config.Description: Skip refreshing metadata for series before searching.

Config.Name: Huntarr - Missing Shows Per Cycle
Config.Description: Maximum missing shows to process per cycle. Set to 0 to disable.

Config.Name: Huntarr - Upgrade Episodes Per Cycle
Config.Description: Maximum upgrade episodes to process per cycle. Set to 0 to disable.

Config.Name: Huntarr - Use Random Selection for Missing
Config.Description: Use random selection for processing missing shows if enabled, or sequential if disabled.

Config.Name: Huntarr - Use Random Selection for Upgrade
Config.Description: Use random selection for processing upgrade episodes if enabled, or sequential if disabled.

Config.Name: Sonarr - API Timeout
Config.Description: Timeout for API requests in seconds.

Config.Name: Huntarr - Sleep Duration
Config.Description: Duration, in seconds, to wait between cycles.

Config.Name: Huntarr - Reset Interval
Config.Description: Interval, in hours, after which to reset the processed state files. Set to 0 to disable.

Config.Name: Huntarr - Minimum Queue Size
Config.Description: Minimum number of items in the download queue before starting a hunt. Set to -1 to disable.

Config.Name: Debug Mode
Config.Description: Enable debug mode for detailed logging.

Config.Name: Command Status - Wait Time
Config.Description: Delay in seconds between checking for command status

Config.Name: Command Status - Max Attempts
Config.Description: Maximum number of attempts to check for command status
